thread.title: Chelsea and Manchester United scout West Ham star Michail Antonio | Metro News
thread.title_full: Chelsea and Manchester United scout West Ham star Michail Antonio | Metro News

author: Louis Sealey For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Chelsea and Manchester United scout West Ham star Michail Antonio | Metro News
text:
Chelsea and Manchester United scout West Ham star Michail Antonio gossip Louis Sealey for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 14 Feb 2017 5:24 pm West Ham’s Michail Antonio could be targeted at the end of the season (Picture: Getty) Chelsea and Manchester United are scouting West Ham star Michail Antonio ahead of the summer transfer window, according to reports. Antonio, 26, has impressed for Slaven Bilic’s Hammers this season, scoring eight goals in 32 games. Nicking a living! Mesut Ozil's Arsenal career risks turning full circle His performances have alerted the attention of several Premier League sides and The People say Chelsea, United and Everton are keeping tabs on his situation. Antonio Conte’s Chelsea and Jose Mourinho’s United are expected to enjoy productive transfer windows at the end of the season. Conte, who has taken his side eight points clear in the title race, is understood to want to bring in reinforcements for Chelsea’s campaign in Europe next season. Chelsea fixtures 
Swansea (H) – Sat 25 Feb West Ham (A) – Mon 6 Mar Watford (H) – Mon 13 Mar Stoke (A) – Sat 18 Mar Crystal Palace (H) – Sat 1 Apr Manchester City (H) – Wed 5 Apr Bournemouth (A) – Sat 8 Apr Manchester United (A) – Sat 15 Apr Chelsea boss Antonio Conte (Picture: Getty) Meanwhile, Mourinho has admitted he will target several additions in the summer as he looks to build on United’s promising run under his management.
